description.en:
Miyabi's first meeting with her seniors,
Teruhiko, was so memorable that she strategized.
Miyabi applied to be the manager of the soccer club so she could get close to the boy she wanted. Miyabi's hopes were blazing.
Why does Teru always call her Miya chan? Is she...? Oh, it turns out her love was unrequited. They officially became lovers. Duh, Miyabi felt like the luckiest girl in the world.
lucky girl in the world.

However, it turned out that happiness did not last long.
Miyabi's love floated along with the accident that killed her lover. The world feels dark. What is Miyabi's next fate? Will she be able to survive? Can she open her heart to another guy?

(Source: Goodreads, translated)
description.id:
Pertemuan pertama Miyabi dengan kakak kelasnya,
Teruhiko, sangat berkesan. la pun lalu pasang strategi.
Miyabi melamar jadi manajer klub sepak bola agar bisa mendekati cowok pujaannya itu. Harapan Miyabi berkobar.
Mengapa Kak Teru selalu memanggilnya Miya chan? Apakah dia...? Oh, ternyata cintanya tidak bertepuk sebelah tangan. Mereka pun resmi menjadi sepasang kekasih. Duh, Miyabi merasa sebagai gadis paling
beruntung di dunia.

Namun, ternyata kebahagiaan itu tidak berlangsung lama.
Cinta Miyabi melayang seiring dengan kecelakaan yang menewaskan kekasihnya. Dunia serasa gelap. Bagaimana nasib Miyabi selanjutnya? Apakah ia mampu bertahan? Apakah ia bisa membuka hati untuk cowok lain?

(Sumber: Goodreads)
